title: Qualify a Buyer Before a Showing
description: Before showing a property, a listing agent wants to ensure the potential buyer is qualified.

tasks.description: When a showing is requested, ask the buyer's agent if their client is pre-approved for a mortgage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inquires about the buyer's qualification status.

tasks.description: Request a copy of the buyer's pre-approval letter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The listing agent receives the pre-approval letter.

tasks.description: Once the pre-approval is verified, approve the showing request.
tasks.expected_outcome: The showing is confirmed after the buyer's financial ability is verified.
